title: The Black Book of Unethical Financial Tricks: 50 Tricks that Guilty Companies Do
description: This book puts together 50 unethical financial tricks that many companies use to falsify their financial statements and present unrealistic financial strength for their hidden advantages. If you are a business owner, chief executive, business manager, investor, financial auditor, business consultant, business analyst, accountant, or Finance & Accounting student, this book is for you. The finance and accounting beauty could not be seen in academic books but examined and touched when put into practice. I tried in this book to explain each unethical financial trick in simple terms. This book calls back to vigilance, honesty, and transparency that God created within us.
author: Sulaiman Algharbi
